alert.note: Alert for Saginaw; Shiawassee (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 20 at 1:57PM EDT until July 20 at 3:00PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 300 PM EDT FOR SAGINAW AND NORTHERN SHIAWASSEE COUNTIES... At 156 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Marion Springs, or 8 miles west of Chesaning, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. This severe storm will be near... Henderson around 200 PM EDT. Oakley around 205 PM EDT. Chesaning around 210 PM EDT. New Lothrop around 215 PM EDT. Birch Run around 230 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Brant, Nelson, Garfield, Fenmore, Burt, Gera, Layton Corners, Swan Creek, Juddville and Shiawassee National Wildlife Refuge. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
